Title: Great Vessel of Salvation
Description:
I know what you and the girl-panda seek. We can perform the rite for you... in time.

First, I require aid. The seeds fall from our great mother-tree. It is our responsibility to collect them, even in dangerous times like these.

Escort my chanters to the motherseeds, that they may bring them back to the collection pit.
ObjectivesText:
Bring 3 Motherseeds to the collection pit in Rikkitun Village, with the assistance of the Rikkitun Chanters.

You can use the Rikkitun Bell to re-summon your chanters if you become separated.
CompletionText: The collection pit is down the hill, just to the west of here.
RewardText:
Yes, good. The motherseeds are taken care of.

Now, we may speak of your enchantment.

Objectives.Text: Bring Motherseed back to the Motherseed Pit
